## 解説 The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> method first sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> control to reference the design\-time data source and sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property to **languageKeyword tag is not supported!!!!** . The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> calls back to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method of the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class to bind to the design\-time data source. Finally, it restores the original values of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> properties.
The**parameterReference tag is not supported!!!!** parameter is the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.
